author: slaws
msg: Update the Node API to only allow the node contents to be modified when the node is stopped. This make managing contribution updates much simpler
Fix up the addContributionToDomain semantics to make this a mandatory step with deploys deployable Composite.java
Fix up the samples that use the node to take account of these changes
Change the current domain function to use these features.
